message: A fair starting point, let's see if Bob agrees!
Alice, I think you're being a bit greedy. I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking most of the money.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle and see if you're willing to accept this offer.
Alice, I'm not willing to give you the majority of the money. You'll have to meet me at this number if you want to finish the game.
